articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures are little changed as Trump approves Nvidia chips sales to China: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Out of the 11 S&P 500 sectors, the tech sector was the only one that closed in the green on Monday.
articles.content:
Stock futures were little changed Tuesday, despite a bump in Nvidia shares after President Donald Trump approved H200 chip sales to China in a deal that gives the U.S. government a hefty cut. 
Futur… [+2862 chars]

articles.title: EU investigates Google over AI-generated summaries in search results - BBC
articles.description: It is examining whether the tech giant did not offer "appropriate compensation" to web publishers.
articles.content:
The EU has opened an investigation into Google over its artificial intelligence (AI) summaries which appear above search results.
